description: The Purple Tree Mobile Kitchen is a healthy organic dessert truck concept developed in the minds of two dedicated dads in search of the most delectable and healthy refreshments on the planet to feed their kiddos. Purple Tree Organic Açaí blends are yummy blends of pureed açaí palm fruit prepared with granola, fresh chopped fruit toppings, shaved coconut, and locally sourced honey. Purple Tree blends are all organic, dairy free, and made without any artificial sweeteners. In addition we offer fruit smoothies, custom ice cream sandwiches and vegan baked desserts.Owners André Newman and David Krummenacker are two health conscious family guys bringing the best of anti-oxidant magic to Tucson. When it comes to fueling for health, trust this team: André is an acrobat and seasoned local public health advocate. David is a former Olympiad and solar power technician. *Our food truck appliances are solar powered making full use of the sun to help to create our unique brand of healthy goodness.
name: Purple Tree Organic Açai Blends
